amendment.description: To provide for the procurement of certain pharmaceuticals at the lowest possible price for products of assured quality.

vote.text: Amendment SA 681 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 54. Record Vote Number: 181.

action.text: Amendment SA 681 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR 5/15/2003 S6478-6481; text: CR 5/15/2003 S6478) To provide for the procurement of certain pharmaceuticals at the lowest possible price for products of assured quality.
